trans-unit.source: Contains a read-only collection of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> objects for each <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> in a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.

A user cannot add or remove a <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> from the collection, but can change the properties of the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> corresponding to a particular <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Um usuário não pode adicionar ou remover um <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> da coleção, mas pode alterar as propriedades do <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> correspondente a um determinado <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.

trans-unit.source: Adding or removing a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from the DataSet adds or removes the corresponding <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adicionando ou removendo uma <xref:System.Data.DataTable> do conjunto de dados adiciona ou remove correspondente <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> da coleção.

trans-unit.source: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo é seguro para operações de leitura e multithread.

trans-unit.source: You must synchronize any write operations.
trans-unit.target: Você deve sincronizar todas as operações de gravação.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> instance starting at the specified index.
The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the values copied from the collection.
The index of the array at which to start inserting.
Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> instance starting at the specified index.
The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the values copied from the collection.
The index of the array at which to start inserting.
Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> instance starting at the specified index.
Gets the number of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection" />.
The number of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> objetos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> objects is the same as the number of <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> objetos é o mesmo que o número de <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objetos no <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection" /> is read-only.
Returns <see langword="true" />.
Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection" /> is synchronized (thread-safe).
This property is always <see langword="false" />, unless overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é sempre <see langword="false" />, a menos que substituído por uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: This property implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection> using the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas podem fornecer uma versão sincronizada do <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection> usando o <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> from the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> to find.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> objects of the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> from the collection.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> objects.
The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> to find.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> objects of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> specified by its index.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> objects.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> to find.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> specified by its name.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> objects.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection" />.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso ao <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection> using the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas podem fornecer uma versão sincronizada do <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection> usando o <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Program code must always perform synchronized operations on the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>, not directly on the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Código do programa deve sempre executar operações sincronizadas no <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> do <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>, não diretamente no <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This guarantees the correct operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: Isso garante que a operação correta de coleções que são derivados de outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains the correct synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, ele mantém a sincronização correta com outros threads que podem ser simultaneamente modificando o <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>.
